Uses of Class
topdown.State

    • Uses of State in topdown

      Methods in topdown that return State 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      State Game.getState()
      Returns the State object for the state of the game currently.
      static State State.valueOf(java.lang.String name)
      Returns the enum constant of this type with the specified name.
      static State[] State.values()
      Returns an array containing the constants of this enum type, in the order they are declared.
      Methods in topdown with parameters of type State 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void Game.setState(State state)
      Sets the state of the game based on the State object passed.
